G

getActivities() - Method in class pack.ActivityList
This method returns an ArrayList containing activity objects.
getActivitiesByActivity() - Method in class pack.ActivityList
This method returns a string of activities from activityList sorted by their names and separated by a \n.
getActivitiesByActivity() - Method in class pack.Controller
This method returns activities by name by calling the ActivityList method getActivitiesByActivity().
getActivitiesByDate() - Method in class pack.ActivityList
This method returns a string of activities from activityList sorted by their dates and separated by a \n.
getActivitiesByDate() - Method in class pack.Controller
This method returns activities by date by calling the ActivityList method getActivitiesByDate().
getActivitiesText() - Method in class pack.ActivityList
This method returns a string of activities from activityList separated by a \n.
getActivitiesText() - Method in class pack.Controller
This method returns a list of activities in String form by calling the ActivityList method getActivitiesText() and storing the output of the method in a String called text.
getActivity(int, LocalDate, String, int) - Method in class pack.ActivityList
This method returns an activity corresponding to the parameters passed to the method by constructing a new activity out of the parameters.
getActivity(int, LocalDate, String, int) - Method in class pack.Controller
This method returns an activity which corresponds to the entered parameters by calling the ActivityList getActivity() method .
getActivityByIndex(int) - Method in class pack.ActivityList
This method returns the activity at the specified index.
getActivityByIndex(int) - Method in class pack.Controller
This method returns an activity by its index by calling the ActivityList method getActivityByIndex().
getNumberOfActivities() - Method in class pack.Controller
This method returns the size of the list of activities in ActivityList by calling the ActivityList method getActivities().
getTotal(int) - Method in class pack.Controller
This method returns the total points of a week of activities by calling the ActivityList method getTotalPoints() and storing its return value in an integer variable called total.
getTotalOfAllWeeks() - Method in class pack.Controller
This method returns the total points of all activities by calling the ActivityList method getTotalPointsOfAllWeeks() and storing its return value in an integer variable called total.
getTotalPoints(int) - Method in class pack.ActivityList
This method returns the total points of a week of activities in the activityList.
getTotalPointsOfAllWeeks() - Method in class pack.ActivityList
This method returns the sum of all points of all activities in the activityList.
